\section{Accessing D2}
For Deliverable 2 we are using the Trac system, accessible via the link:
\\ \\
http://hoved.dcs.gla.ac.uk/w/trac
\\ \\
On the Wiki page displayed after visiting this link are four links. One for
our Gantt chart, quality assurance plan, risk management plan, and change
management plan.


The `Roadmap' section of the website displays our project milestones and
associated tickets.


The username and password for login are:
User: readOnly
Pass: readOnly
